commit.message: unify timeout config in cluster plan executor
Merge branch 'cluster_new' of https://github.com/apache/incubator-iotdb into cluster_new

nodes.bodyText: It would be better if you enforce the parameter in the constructor to be TSocket, so there will be less chance to trigger a ClassCastException when the code is modified by another person.
The same transport is used in both input and output, so it is unnecessary to set twice.
Add comments explaining that the configs are only for internal communications, not for the whole operation.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -58,7 +58,13 @@ max_concurrent_client_num=10000
 default_replica_num=2
 
 # connection time out (ms) among raft nodes
-connection_time_out_ms=20000
+connection_timeout_ms=20000
+
+# write operation timeout threshold (ms)
+write_operation_timeout_ms=30000
+
+# read operation timeout threshold (ms)
+read_operation_timeout_ms=30000
